Ensure currency sale delivery date is required

Ensure fee account is selected
Ensure validity period is >= application date

specs.title: Validate backend-conditional validation rules for Forex application

stdout.text: ‚úÖ Date comparison contract verified: Input.Date >= ValidityPeriod
Error message: "Date must be equal or lesser than Validity period of purchase"
‚úÖ Date comparison contract verified: Input.ValidityPeriod <= Date
Error message: "Validity period of purchase must be greater or equal than Date"

steps.title: Ensure amount to buy is required if amount to sell is empty
Ensure amount to sell is required if amount to buy is empty
Ensure exchange rate is required when "DefinedByTheClient"
Ensure purchase delivery date is required for "TOM" or "SPOT"
Ensure application date is <= validity period
Ensure validity period is >= application date

specs.title: Validate backend-decimal constraints for Forex application

steps.title: Ensure amount to buy has 2 decimals with min "0.01"
Ensure amount to sell has 2 decimals with min "0.01"
Ensure exchange rate has 4 decimals with min "0.0001"
Ensure contract amount has 2 decimals with min "0.01"

specs.title: Validate backend-additional business constraints for Forex application
